// CodeChef, "Area of Polygon"
// https://www.codechef.com/problems/R303

#include <stdint.h>
#include <vector>
#include <iomanip>
#include <iostream>

using namespace std;


struct Point {
  int x, y;
  
  Point() { }
  Point(int const &x, int const &y): x(x), y(y) { }
  ~Point() { }
};


void test() {
  int n;
  cin >> n;
  
  vector<Point> P(n + 1);
  for(int i = 0; i < n; ++i) cin >> P[i].x;
  for(int i = 0; i < n; ++i) cin >> P[i].y;
  P[n] = P[0];
  
  int64_t S = 0;
  for(int i = 0; i < n; ++i) S += (P[i+1].x - P[i].x) * (P[i].y + P[i+1].y);
  
  cout << S * 0.5 << '\n';
}


int main() {
  ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
  cin.tie(NULL);
  
  cout << fixed << setprecision(1);
  
  int t;
  cin >> t;
  while(t --> 0) test();
  
  return 0;
}
